description: Irregular triangular array read by rows. T(n,k) is the number of length n words x on {0,1,2} such that I(x) + W_0(x)*W_1(x) + W_0(x)*W_2(x) + W_1(x)*W_2(x) = k where I(x) is the number of inversions in x and W_i(x) is the number of occurrences of the letter i in x for i={0,1,2}, n>=0, 0<=k<=floor(2n^2/3).
